name: Hiten
wishText: May bless you will all the happiness and success in the world! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something different, something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if wapas dekhna hai toh.
